  "title": "Restaurant Supervisor",
  "description": "Extramileage Consults Limited - Our client, a Quick Service Restaurant, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Supervisor
Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos

Requirements


	OND/NCE/HND/B.Sc. in Hospitality, Business Administration or a related field
	Minimum 2 years of experience in a supervisory role in food service or hospitality
	Knowledge of food handling and kitchen operations.


Starting Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 per month.&nbsp;

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;extramileageconsultslimited@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;For more enquires call; 09135200982.",

Restaurant Supervisor Job at Extramileage Consults Limited




        
    

        
        Extramileage Consults Limited - Our client, a Quick Service Restaurant, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Supervisor
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos

Requirements


	OND/NCE/HND/B.Sc. in Hospitality, Business Administration or a related field
	Minimum 2 years of experience in a supervisory role in food service or hospitality
	Knowledge of food handling and kitchen operations.


Starting Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 per month. 
     

            
    



Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: extramileageconsultslimited@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquires call; 09135200982.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Facility Manager",
  "description": "Virtual Media Network Limited (VMML) is a creative, new media and broadcast media content and properties production, acquisition, and sales company. We warehouse a wide variety of highly entertaining and muIti-culturally relevant content, inhabiting muItiple platforms ranging from TV to Radio, Web, Mobile, and Social Media.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Oversee the daily operations of the company&rsquo;s facilities, ensuring functionality, safety, and efficiency.
	Plan and coordinate maintenance activities (preventive and corrective).
	Manage vendor relationships and service contracts for facility services (e.g., cleaning, security, power, repairs, etc.).
	Ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental standards.
	Develop and implement facility management policies and procedures.
	Manage budgets for facility operations and monitor expenditures.
	Coordinate space management, office setup, and refurbishment projects.
	Respond promptly to facility-related emergencies and resolve issues efficiently.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Facilities Management, Engineering, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 4 years of experience in facility management or a similar role.
	Strong knowledge of building systems (electrical, plumbing, HVAC, security).
	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.
	Strong communication and negotiation skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and facility management software (an added advantage).
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;motunrayo.adedamola@virtualmediang.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-23",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Virtual Media Network Limited"
    
  },

    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",

Facility Manager Job at Virtual Media Network Limited




        
    

        
        Virtual Media Network Limited (VMML) is a creative, new media and broadcast media content and properties production, acquisition, and sales company. We warehouse a wide variety of highly entertaining and muIti-culturally relevant content, inhabiting muItiple platforms ranging from TV to Radio, Web, Mobile, and Social Media.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager
Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee the daily operations of the company’s facilities, ensuring functionality, safety, and efficiency.
	Plan and coordinate maintenance activities (preventive and corrective).
	Manage vendor relationships and service contracts for facility services (e.g., cleaning, security, power, repairs, etc.).
	Ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental standards.
	Develop and implement facility management policies and procedures.
	Manage budgets for facility operations and monitor expenditures.
	Coordinate space management, office setup, and refurbishment projects.
	Respond promptly to facility-related emergencies and resolve issues efficiently.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Facilities Management, Engineering, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 4 years of experience in facility management or a similar role.
	Strong knowledge of building systems (electrical, plumbing, HVAC, security).
	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.
	Strong communication and negotiation skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and facility management software (an added advantage).
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: motunrayo.adedamola@virtualmediang.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
